title: Zebrafish
summary: The zebrafish (Danio rerio) is a freshwater fish belonging to the minnow family (Cyprinidae) of the order Cypriniformes. Native to South Asia, it is a popular aquarium fish, frequently sold under the trade name zebra danio[2] (and thus often called a "tropical fish" although both tropical and subtropical). It is also found in private ponds.
